name: Tappy Quack
description:
Tappy world has been taken over by Big Boss Block and his mini blocks, and all the butterflies are gone.

It's up to you Tappy Quack to fly your way through a world of obstacles and challenges and defeat the big boss block, and return Tappy World back to what it used to be.

Beware though, Big Block Boss and his helpers will be out there too, trying to stop you from reaching the end.

Fly Tappy Quack by clicking the screen, while avoiding obstacles, and fly your way to the very end. Collect Stars to earn points and post your highest score to compete against others online.

Ultra Line Software hopes you enjoy this fun colorful, yet challenging game.
